basic.floral_language:
Senecio macroglossus 
Floriography: tenacious, vigorous, beautiful
Senecio macroglossus has a similar like to ivy, is a climbing plant, but succulent, with fleshy thick leaves, near triangle shape and symmetrical, usually placed in the living room, on desk, or make a pot for hanging.
Senecio macroglossus likes half shade, place in scattered light in summer, but need more light in winter. When conditions are right. Flowers in yellow color.
basic.blooming: Succulent plants, sometimes flowers, yellow flowers

maintenance.soil: Peat or soil with specific nutrients
maintenance.sunlight: Like light, also resistant to half shade, put in places with scattered light in summer, may take more light in winter
maintenance.watering: Likes wet environments, water thoroughly when soil is dry, rub leaves with water in summer
maintenance.fertilization: Dilute fertilizers following instructions, apply 1-2 times monthly in spring and autumn, stop in summer and winter
